chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
eqTerm_imp_eqT: forall a b : Term A n, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b

Goal:
forall p q r s : list (Term A n), ltP (A:=A) ltM p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> eqP p r -> eqP q s -> ltP (A:=A) ltM r s

Premises:
ltP : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
eqT : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive eqP : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop := eqP0 : eqP (pO A n) (pO A n) | eqpP1 : forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP p q -> eqP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q) Arguments eqP (_ _)%list_scope Arguments eqpP1 _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
canonical : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
eqTerm : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b |- Prop]
inright : ?B -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b |- Prop]
inleft : ?A -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b |- Prop]
ssrbool.is_inleft : ?A + {?B} -> bool where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b |- Prop]
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b |- Prop]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b |- Type]
ltP_pX_canonical : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
canonical_skip_fst : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l)
canonical_imp_in_nzero : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> forall a : Term A n, In a p -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a
eqP_ind : forall P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop, P (pO A n) (pO A n) -> (forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP p q -> P p q -> P (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q)) -> forall l l0 : list (Term A n), eqP l l0 -> P l l0
eqP_sind : forall P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> SProp, P (pO A n) (pO A n) -> (forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP p q -> P p q -> P (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q)) -> forall l l0 : list (Term A n), eqP l l0 -> P l l0
nzeroP_multTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
moreCoefStructure.A_sep : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) A0 -> eqA a A0 \/ eqA b A0
multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
ltP_sind : forall (A : Set) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> SProp), (forall (x : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), P (pO A n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) x p)) -> (forall (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM x y -> P (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) x p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) y q)) ->...-> P l l0
ltP_ind : forall (A : Set) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop), (forall (x : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), P (pO A n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) x p)) -> (forall (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM x y -> P (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) x p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) y q)) ->...-> P l l0
canonical_pX_ltP : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n))
canonical_pX_eqT : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a b : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p)
ltP_order_comp : forall (A : Set) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a b c : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltP (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q) -> ltT (A:=A) ltM a c -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b c
ltT_dec : forall (A : Set) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> forall x y : Term A n, {ltT (A:=A) ltM x y} + {ltT (A:=A) ltM y x} + {eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) x y}
fltP : forall (A : Set) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltP (A:=A) ltM p q -> Relation_Operators_compat.Ltl (mon n) ltM (fP A n p) (fP A n q)
canonical_cons : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l))
ltP_tl : forall (A : Set) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) x y -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p q -> ltP (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) x p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) y q)
not_double_canonical : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), ~ canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p))
eqT_zerop_is_eqTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b
canonical0 : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a b : Term A n), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (pO A n)))
eqpP1 : forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP p q -> eqP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q)
zeroP_plusTermr : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b)
